briefdescription.para: File C++ (associated to Reader_Root_Dyn2Dyn_Part.h) for read ICD3 files and put in variables metadatas for the ICD6's Root Group.

detaileddescription.para: Overview: This function readRoot is described (programmed) here. It needs as parameter a Stock_Write_Root_Dyn2Dyn_Metadata_Part object. The readRoot function will read root metadatas and stock them in the Stock_Write_Root_Dyn2Dyn_Metadata_Part object as private attributes thanks to stockRootMetadata function. These attributes will be written in the next step by writeRootMetadata function which is in the class Stock_Write_Root_Dyn2Dyn_Metadata_Part.h and called at the end of this Reader_Root_Part.cpp
